summary: Changes the ever-popular Forsworn armor to a snow-leopard texture. This changes ONLY the main armor, not the gloves or boots or silly headdress. Available in Full Outfit, No Undies, and Bottoms Only versions.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow][size=4]Check out my non-replacer version of this mod here: [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=886]http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=886[/url][/size][/color][/b]
[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/446387-1321399162.jpg[/img]
Snow Leopard Forsworn by Rekicker

Changes the ever-popular Forsworn armor to a snow-leopard texture.

[center][b][color=Darkorange]Featured in MMOxReview\'s Skyrim Mods Weekly #2[/color][/b]
[youtube]3mzHPQkBOPk[/youtube][/center]

Available in [b]Full Outfit[/b], [b]No Undies[/b], and [b]Bottoms Only[/b] versions.

[color=Darkorange][b]UPDATE: Fixed a floating pixel noted by BlechBOX. Please download the new file (Version 2) for the fix. Thanks.[/b][/color]

[color=Darkorange][b]UPDATE 2: Now includes optional textures for gloves and boots as well as a set for any discerning gentlemen of Skyrim.[/b][/color]

[color=Yellow][b]UPDATE 3: Zilch (the Breton girlie in the pics) is now available for download by request: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=399[/b][/color]

[color=Darkorange][b]UPDATE 4: Available files now include an optional texture for regular leopard hide thanks to XunAmarox.[/b][/color]

INSTALL
1. Choose one of the available options.
2. Drop the textures folder from your chosen option into your Data folder.
3. Enjoy.

UNINSTALL
1. Delete the textures from your Data/textures/armor/forsworn folder.
2. Stop enjoying.

HOW TO GET THE ARMOR
Option One: Go west. Plenty of folks around Markarth to kill wearing this armor.
Option Two: Use ~ key to bring up the console. Type \'player.additem 000D8D50 1\' in the console. Press the Enter key. Press ~ to close the console. It\'s in your inventory now.
Option Three: Ask in comments or on the SkyrimNexus.com forum because you failed to read this. You will get directed to Option One or Option Two.

PRE-ANSWERED QUESTIONS
Want to mod this mod or upload this mod elsewhere? Go ahead.
Want to give me credit? Thanks.
Don\'t want to give me credit? Oh well.
author: Rekicker

files.name: Snow Leopard Forsworn Gloves and Boots -Female
